bibl.title: Through Process to Product: Studying Meat Preservation in Ancient Egypt.
L'apport de l'Égypte à l'histoire des techniques. Méthodes, chronologie et comparaisons
bibl.author: IKRAM, Salima

bibl.note: Meat preservation. - Drying. - Salting. - Salting and spicing. - Salt, fat, and fire. - Conclusion.
IKRAM Salima, Through Process to Product: Studying Meat Preservation in Ancient Egypt.

Bernard MATHIEU, Dimitri MEEKS et Myriam WISSA (Édd.), L'apport de l'Égypte à l'histoire des techniques. Méthodes, chronologie et comparaisons = Bibliothèque d'étude. 142 (Le Caire, 2006) pp. 125-131.
